languages.text: "И что же я увидел! Свалку на месте изысканного портика! Железные муравейники, облепившие колонны! Мраморные плиты, растащенные нищими на облицовку их хижин!" {n}Гордей роняет голову.{/n} "Вот уже дюжину лет как я здесь, и все еще не могу оправиться от шока. Я догадывался, что не все, описанное в буклете, окажется реальностью. Но не ожидал, никак не ожидал увидеть Футфол в такой разрухе. Он — словно ужасный, разлагающийся труп возлюбленной красавицы".

"And what did I see? A dump in place of the exquisite portico! Metal anthills clinging to the columns! The marble tiles pilfered by paupers to use as cladding for their hovels!" {n}Gordei hangs his head.{/n} "It's been a dozen years since I came here, and I still haven't recovered from the shock. I had suspected that not everything from the booklet would exist in reality, but I never expected to see Footfall in such a sorry state. It is like stumbling upon the horrible, decomposing corpse of your beautiful beloved."
languages.original_text: "И что же я увидел! Свалку на месте изысканного портика! Железные муравейники, облепившие колонны! Мраморные плиты, растащенные нищими на облицовку их хижин!" {n}Гордей роняет голову.{/n} "Вот уже дюжину лет как я здесь, и все еще не могу оправиться от шока. Я догадывался, что не все, описанное в буклете, окажется реальностью. Но не ожидал, никак не ожидал увидеть Футфол в такой разрухе. Он — словно ужасный, разлагающийся труп возлюбленной красавицы".

The marble tiles — pilfered by paupers to use as veneers for their hovels!" {n}Gordei hangs his head.{/n} "It's been a dozen years since I came here, and I still haven't recovered from the shock. I had figured that not everything from the booklet would turn out to be real. But I never expected to see Footfall in such a sorry state. It is like witnessing the horrible, decomposing corpse of your beautiful beloved."

languages.text: 「実際の景色に絶望しました。豪華なポルチコとは名ばかりのゴミ捨て場！柱には金属製の蟻塚がくっついている！大理石のタイルは、貧民が掘っ立て小屋の外壁に使うために盗まれていた！」{n}ゴルデイはうなだれた。{/n}「当時のショックから立ち直れずに10数年経っています。小冊子に掲載されているものすべてが実在するわけではないと覚悟はしていましたが、まさかフットフォールがこんな酷い状態にあるとは思ってもみませんでした。まるで最愛の人のおぞましく腐敗した死体に出くわしたようなものです」
languages.original_text: "And what did I see? A dump in place of the exquisite portico! Metal anthills clinging to the columns! The marble tiles pilfered by paupers to use as cladding for their hovels!" {n}Gordei hangs his head.{/n} "It's been a dozen years since I came here, and I still haven't recovered from the shock. I had suspected that not everything from the booklet would exist in reality, but I never expected to see Footfall in such a sorry state. It is like stumbling upon the horrible, decomposing corpse of your beautiful beloved."

traits.locale_text: 「実際の景色に絶望しました。豪華なポルチコとは名ばかりのゴミ捨て場！柱には金属製の蟻塚がくっついている！大理石のタイルは、貧民が掘っ立て小屋の外壁に使うために盗まれていた！」{n}ゴルデイはうなだれた。{/n}「当時のショックから立ち直れずに10数年経っています。小冊子に掲載されているものすべてが実在するわけではないと覚悟はしていましたが、まさかフットフォールがこんな酷い状態にあるとは思ってもみませんでした。まるで最愛の人のおぞましく腐敗した死体に出くわしたようなものです」

languages.text: “可我看到了什么？原本精致的门廊变成了垃圾堆！那些辉煌的柱子旁边到处都是金属制成的蚁丘！那些穷人偷走了大理石瓷砖，就为了盖他们的破茅屋！”{n}戈尔代垂下了头。{/n}“我来到这里之后，已经过了十几年了，但我仍然没能从打击中恢复过来。我确实怀疑过，小册子上预想的一切或许没办法完全实现，但我却万万没想到，落脚港竟然陷入了如此糟糕的境地。就好像您无意间发现了您美丽爱人的尸体，而它早已腐烂得面目全非。”
languages.original_text: "And what did I see? A dump in place of the exquisite portico! Metal anthills clinging to the columns! The marble tiles pilfered by paupers to use as cladding for their hovels!" {n}Gordei hangs his head.{/n} "It's been a dozen years since I came here, and I still haven't recovered from the shock. I had suspected that not everything from the booklet would exist in reality, but I never expected to see Footfall in such a sorry state. It is like stumbling upon the horrible, decomposing corpse of your beautiful beloved."

traits.locale_text: “可我看到了什么？原本精致的门廊变成了垃圾堆！那些辉煌的柱子旁边到处都是金属制成的蚁丘！那些穷人偷走了大理石瓷砖，就为了盖他们的破茅屋！”{n}戈尔代垂下了头。{/n}“我来到这里之后，已经过了十几年了，但我仍然没能从打击中恢复过来。我确实怀疑过，小册子上预想的一切或许没办法完全实现，但我却万万没想到，落脚港竟然陷入了如此糟糕的境地。就好像您无意间发现了您美丽爱人的尸体，而它早已腐烂得面目全非。”

languages.text: «¿Y qué fue lo que vi? ¡Un cuchitril en lugar de aquel pórtico tan exquisito! ¡Había hormigueros de metal en las columnas! ¡No quedaban baldosas de mármol porque los indigentes las habían robado para sus chabolas!». {n}Gordei agacha la cabeza.{/n} «Han pasado doce años desde que vine aquí y todavía no me he recuperado del espanto. Sospechaba que no todo lo que hubiera en el folleto iba a ser verdad, pero jamás esperé ver Paso en un estado tan deplorable. Es como toparse con el cadáver descompuesto de tu amante».
languages.original_text: "And what did I see? A dump in place of the exquisite portico! Metal anthills clinging to the columns! The marble tiles pilfered by paupers to use as cladding for their hovels!" {n}Gordei hangs his head.{/n} "It's been a dozen years since I came here, and I still haven't recovered from the shock. I had suspected that not everything from the booklet would exist in reality, but I never expected to see Footfall in such a sorry state. It is like stumbling upon the horrible, decomposing corpse of your beautiful beloved."

traits.locale_text: «¿Y qué fue lo que vi? ¡Un cuchitril en lugar de aquel pórtico tan exquisito! ¡Había hormigueros de metal en las columnas! ¡No quedaban baldosas de mármol porque los indigentes las habían robado para sus chabolas!». {n}Gordei agacha la cabeza.{/n} «Han pasado doce años desde que vine aquí y todavía no me he recuperado del espanto. Sospechaba que no todo lo que hubiera en el folleto iba a ser verdad, pero jamás esperé ver Paso en un estado tan deplorable. Es como toparse con el cadáver descompuesto de tu amante».

languages.text: « Et qu'ai-je vu ? Un dépotoir là où devait se trouver le sublime portique ! Des monticules métalliques accrochés aux colonnes ! Les dalles en marbre pillées par les miséreux et utilisées comme revêtement pour leurs masures ! » {n}Gordei baisse la tête.{/n} « Cela fait une bonne dizaine d'années que je suis arrivé ici et je ne m'en suis toujours pas remis. Je me doutais bien que la station ne ressemblerait pas exactement à ce qui était décrit dans l'opuscule, mais je ne m'attendais certainement pas à voir Castel dans un tel état de délabrement. C'était comme découvrir le cadavre horriblement décomposé d'un être cher... »
languages.original_text: "And what did I see? A dump in place of the exquisite portico! Metal anthills clinging to the columns! The marble tiles pilfered by paupers to use as cladding for their hovels!" {n}Gordei hangs his head.{/n} "It's been a dozen years since I came here, and I still haven't recovered from the shock. I had suspected that not everything from the booklet would exist in reality, but I never expected to see Footfall in such a sorry state. It is like stumbling upon the horrible, decomposing corpse of your beautiful beloved."

traits.locale_text: « Et qu'ai-je vu ? Un dépotoir là où devait se trouver le sublime portique ! Des monticules métalliques accrochés aux colonnes ! Les dalles en marbre pillées par les miséreux et utilisées comme revêtement pour leurs masures ! » {n}Gordei baisse la tête.{/n} « Cela fait une bonne dizaine d'années que je suis arrivé ici et je ne m'en suis toujours pas remis. Je me doutais bien que la station ne ressemblerait pas exactement à ce qui était décrit dans l'opuscule, mais je ne m'attendais certainement pas à voir Castel dans un tel état de délabrement. C'était comme découvrir le cadavre horriblement décomposé d'un être cher... »

languages.text: "Und was musste ich sehen? Keine exquisiten Kolonnaden, sondern eine Müllhalde. Ameisenhügel aus Metall, die sich an die Säulen drängten. Und die Marmorfliesen dienten den Armen als Abdeckung ihrer Hütten!" {n}Gordei lässt den Kopf hängen.{/n} "Ein Dutzend Jahre ist vergangen, seit ich herkam, und ich habe mich immer noch nicht von dem Schock erholt. Ich hatte zwar vermutet, dass nicht alles aus dem Büchlein in der Realität existieren würde, aber dass Footfall in so einem Zustand sein würde, damit hatte ich nicht gerechnet. Es war, als würde man über die schreckliche, verrottende Leiche der schönen Liebsten stolpern."
languages.original_text: "And what did I see? A dump in place of the exquisite portico! Metal anthills clinging to the columns! The marble tiles pilfered by paupers to use as cladding for their hovels!" {n}Gordei hangs his head.{/n} "It's been a dozen years since I came here, and I still haven't recovered from the shock. I had suspected that not everything from the booklet would exist in reality, but I never expected to see Footfall in such a sorry state. It is like stumbling upon the horrible, decomposing corpse of your beautiful beloved."

traits.locale_text: "Und was musste ich sehen? Keine exquisiten Kolonnaden, sondern eine Müllhalde. Ameisenhügel aus Metall, die sich an die Säulen drängten. Und die Marmorfliesen dienten den Armen als Abdeckung ihrer Hütten!" {n}Gordei lässt den Kopf hängen.{/n} "Ein Dutzend Jahre ist vergangen, seit ich herkam, und ich habe mich immer noch nicht von dem Schock erholt. Ich hatte zwar vermutet, dass nicht alles aus dem Büchlein in der Realität existieren würde, aber dass Footfall in so einem Zustand sein würde, damit hatte ich nicht gerechnet. Es war, als würde man über die schreckliche, verrottende Leiche der schönen Liebsten stolpern."

languages.text: "Peki ne mi buldum? Zarif sütunlar değil, çöplük! Sütunların etrafını metalle sarmış, karınca yuvasına benzetmişler! Gecekondularına kaplama olsun diye mermer fayansları sökmüşler!" {n}Gordei, başını öne eğiyor.{/n} "Buraya geleli on yıldan fazla zaman geçti, hâlâ şoku atlatamadım. Kitapçıktaki her şeyin gerçek olmayacağını tahmin etmiştim etmesine de... Binliman'ın böylesine rezil hâlde olmasını da beklemiyordum doğrusu. Güzeller güzeli sevgilinin korkunç, çürümüş cesedini bulmak gibi bir şey bu."
languages.original_text: "And what did I see? A dump in place of the exquisite portico! Metal anthills clinging to the columns! The marble tiles pilfered by paupers to use as cladding for their hovels!" {n}Gordei hangs his head.{/n} "It's been a dozen years since I came here, and I still haven't recovered from the shock. I had suspected that not everything from the booklet would exist in reality, but I never expected to see Footfall in such a sorry state. It is like stumbling upon the horrible, decomposing corpse of your beautiful beloved."

traits.locale_text: "Peki ne mi buldum? Zarif sütunlar değil, çöplük! Sütunların etrafını metalle sarmış, karınca yuvasına benzetmişler! Gecekondularına kaplama olsun diye mermer fayansları sökmüşler!" {n}Gordei, başını öne eğiyor.{/n} "Buraya geleli on yıldan fazla zaman geçti, hâlâ o şoku atlatamadım. Kitapçıktaki her şeyin gerçek olmayacağını tahmin etmiştim etmesine de, Binliman'ın böylesine rezil bir hâlde olmasını da beklemiyordum doğrusu. Güzeller güzeli sevgilinin korkunç bir şekilde çürümüş cesedini bulmak gibi bir şey."
